prompts.title: Build a prototype
prompts.content:
<prototype_requirements>
Build an interactive, clickable prototype with:
- Realistic sample data (names, numbers, dates)
- Functional navigation between all screens/sections
- Visual feedback on interactions (hover states, button clicks, form submissions)
- A polished, professional UI using a clean design system
</prototype_requirements>

<output_format>
- Single-page app (SPA) or clear multi-page structure
- Include mock data that demonstrates each feature working
- Make all interactive elements clickable and functional within the prototype
</output_format>

<briefing>
What are we building?
[Short description of the app and its purpose]

Who is the user?
[Primary user persona(s) and what they care about]

Core features needed:

[Section or Feature Group 1]
- [Feature 1]
- [Feature 2]
- [Feature 3]

[Section or Feature Group 2]
- [Feature 1]
- [Feature 2]
- [Feature 3]

[Section or Feature Group 3]
- [Feature 1]
- [Feature 2]
- [Feature 3]

Global expectations
- [Performance, accessibility, responsiveness, branding needs, etc.]
</briefing>

Build this prototype so I can click through and test each feature.
Ask clarifying questions if anything is ambiguous.

prompts.title: Brand Presentation
prompts.content:
Create a Google Slides presentation (10–12 slides) that tells the story of our quarter — what worked, what didn't, and where we should double down in Q1 2026.

I've attached our Q4 2025 marketing performance data:

Include:
- Executive summary with key wins
- Channel-by-channel performance breakdown
- Month-over-month growth trajectory
- Top 3 underperforming areas with recommendations
- Q1 2026 budget reallocation proposal based on ROAS and CAC

Apply the following style guide to the presentation:

## Visual Style Guide

| Element | Specification | Usage |
|---------|---------------|-------|
| **Font** | Inter | All text elements |
| **Primary Color** | #FF6D33 | Headers, accent elements |
| **Secondary Color** | #FFCA51 | Highlights, charts |
| **Text Color** | #0F1E35 | Body text |
| **Background** | #FCF8F4 | Light backgrounds |
| **Shapes** | Rounded rectangles, 8px radius | Section dividers, buttons |
| **Images** | Create simple flat illustrations | One per major section |
| **Charts** | Minimal design, no 3D effects | Clean, executive-ready |

Make the presentation visually compelling and executive-ready. Use the data provided — do not make up any numbers.
